handoff_message: SESSION 2026-02-17: E2E receipt gate implemented. verify_production_truth.py now requires /tmp/e2e_receipt.json (written by test-ps101-simple-flow.js) before contract checks run — structurally prevents declaring PASS without functional testing. production_contract.json gains e2e_gate config. Dead script tag removed (was causing occ=6 backend URL violation). mosaic_ui/ moved to deprecated/ (was persisting old 10-step PS101 architecture into Gate 12 false-passes). Gate 12 updated to recognize v3 8-prompt architecture. pre_push_verification.sh fixed to use test-ps101-simple-flow.js (38/38 PASS). roll_back_to_prev.sh fixed to deploy from frontend/ not mosaic_ui/. New test: .mosaic/enforcement/test_session_start_readiness.py — machine-executable session readiness check (replaces manual CONTEXT_PROVISIONING_TEST.md). Verifier PASS confirmed: E2E_RECEIPT ok, PROD_FRONTEND_HTML ok (bundles=0), PROD_BACKEND_HEALTH ok. NEXT AGENT: Run node test-ps101-simple-flow.js first, then python3 verifiers/verify_production_truth.py — both must PASS before claiming system operational. Portable session start documentation is pending creation.
